blocks.headline: TinaCMS: The Epitome of Flexibility and Customization.
blocks.text: Open your world to endless customization and flexible workflows with the open-source frontend of TinaCMS.

blocks.content:
## Experience Limitless Flexibility with TinaCMS

With TinaCMS, there are no bounds to your creativity. Craft custom field widgets, add bespoke validation to fields, and take advantage of Git-based content to create workflows beyond the CMS interface, including GitHub Actions.

items.headline: Open Source Frontend
items.text: Enjoy the transparency and flexibility of an open-source frontend, supported by a vibrant developer community.

items.headline: Custom Field Widgets
items.text: Exercise full creative control with the ability to create your custom field widgets.

items.headline: Bespoke Field Validation
items.text: Ensure your data integrity with custom validation for your fields, tailored to your needs.

items.headline: Leverage Git
items.text: Maximize the power of Git-based content for creating flexible workflows, extending the potential of your project beyond the CMS.

items.headline: GitHub Actions Integration
items.text: Automate your workflows and improve productivity by integrating with GitHub Actions.

items.headline: Limitless Flexibility
items.text: TinaCMS is designed with flexibility in mind, allowing you to create the exact experience you want.

blocks.headline: Ready for limitless customization and flexibility?
